Sir Konstantin Sergeevich Novoselov, FRS, HonFRSC, HonFInstP  is a Russian-British physicist, and Langworthy Professor in the School of Physics and Astronomy at the University of Manchester. His work on graphene with Andre Geim earned them the Nobel Prize in Physics in 2010.
